phrases: nakushita yakusoku wa hoshi ni
Send the lost promises to the stars
omoide wa tokenai
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
But then divert my eyes
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
kowareta taisetsu na mono to
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
nokoshita kizuato ga kienai
The scars that were left behind will not go away
sorezore no basho made
Now we must depart
mou ikanakucha
To our own separate ways
Six-tatami room, no bath, ten minutes by foot to college.
The rent is cheaper than before at 36,000 yen a month.
A 27-year-old wooden apartment building with a refreshing draft.
My room faces east and the morning sun is bright.
Or rather... what in the world is this about?
Why are you guys sleeping in my room?!
Well, this book said that even if we did not have enough futons, we would not freeze to death if we slept together like this.
Shuuei University: a pun on the publishing company Shuueisha.
Published by Shuuei University Mountain Climbing Club
How to Survive a Pinch on the Mountain
This book is for mountains!
And hey, just whose clothes are you wearing so casually?
Well, I do not have anything left to wear.
And you, Takemoto!
Why do you always go along with this man's cajolery?
Be stronger!
I-I am sorry.
You were not like that at all.
I am sorry for suspecting you.
I could not move... all night.
Please do not cry!
It was Daddy's fault.
Morita-san, you...!
Well, you have not been paying any attention to me lately, Mayama.
What is more important to you?
Me or your job?!
The job is more important, of course!
Whoa, it stinks.
Morita-san, you have not taken a bath in a few days again, have you?
If you are going to wear my clothes, please at least take a bath.
I do not want to.
I mean, the bathhouse is expensive.
That is why I built you one that you can use for free right here!
I do not want to use that thing!
Sign: Former location of the washing machine
It will make me freeze to death.
It is in the middle of winter, you know!
And everyone outside can see you!
And why the heck does it look intentionally dilapidated?
Do not you work for a construction company?
You should have been able to make something better!
What are you talking about?
I do the designs.
The designs!
It was designed to be like an open-air bath among the palm trees.
Do not you get it?
Sheesh.
Then why do not you use it yourself?
Well...
I can use the shower room at work.
So it is on purpose!
What is on purpose?!
I sacrificed a day off to make that for you!
And on top of that, for free!
But you did not need to go out of your way to wind together twigs that you picked up at the park to make it!
Oh, shut up!
Honestly!
Why are you two so lively in the morning?
Mayama-san, you are going to be late for work.
Yamada-san!
Yo.
Takemoto-kun...
Hey, Morita-san, that is one of Mayama's shirts again, is not it?
Wow, how did you know?
You know about every one of Mayama's shirts?
Amazing.
That is... er...
But his clothing drawer is so nice.
It is neatly packed with clean clothes.
Mayama is a neat freak, so...
Oh, yeah.
I am also wearing Mayama's underwear.
Want to see?
Y-You do not need to show me!
Mo-Morita-san!
Morita-san, get a hold of yourself!
I am moved!
Wow, it is been a while!
There is a big river beyond the field of flowers.
Like I said, you cannot cross it!
I wonder if Mayama is all right...
Morita-san constantly haunts Mayama's room whether it is summer or winter...
No matter how hard he works, perhaps his pay gets sucked up by Morita-san...
Bring more sake!
I wonder if he hid his bankbook and seal properly...
Note: in Japan, a personal seal is used instead of a signature in official documents.
Ah, but I cannot suspect other people so casually!
You already are.
Your thoughts are all leaking out.
Get a grip, Ayumi!
Have faith in your friends!
Believe!
I will believe, too!
Banzai for the Iron Lady!
Believe!
But why does not Mayama move from that apartment now that he is finally a working man and has money?
I am sure his pay is not bad.
I also thought about that, so I asked Mayama-san.
And then...
Because there is something I want.
What does he want?
I did not ask that...
I see.
Something Mayama wants that I do not know about.
He is decided on a goal, found a way to get there, and is looking straight ahead.
That is right.
He is not afraid of becoming an adult.
That is the person I fell in love with.
And he was all unya unya and maudlin just a little while ago.
Unya unya?
Ayu!
Takemoto-kun!
Hagu-chan.
What is up?
Look, look!
This came earlier!
Wow, it is adorable!
You look good in a kimono.
You look like a doll!
Oh no, do I really look like a Hakata doll?
Hakata doll: a traditional Japanese doll made from clay, usually wears a kimono.
And when did you take this picture?
New Year's Day.
It was taken in Nagano for my Coming of Age ceremony.
Coming of Age ceremony is held in January of the year one turns twenty.
This is not 7-5-3?
7-5-3 (Shichi-go-san) is a festival for children who are three, five, or seven years old.
And there are other poses in this album!
Here we go.
Look at how big I have gotten!
Hey now, Morita-san!
There you go again, touching such a delicate subject without any hesitation!
Over here!
Hagutaro!
Hagutaro: a pun on Hamtaro.
Wait!
I see.
So Hagu-chan is also an adult now.
I am glad that I was not the only one who thought the picture was for 7-5-3.
But...
You like sunflower seeds, right?
Yeah, she might have matured a little.
She is worked on something other than art...
And remember?
At first, she only spoke with Sensei and you, Takemoto-kun.
That is true.
That is right.
She is changed, too.
Little by little, but probably in a good way.
And I am just selfish for feeling lonely because of that.
She was really quiet at first, was not she?
All she did was silently look at everyone from behind Sensei, like this.
That is right, just like that.
Yeah, yeah.
I am back, Japan.
Sensei?!
You are all horrible!
Wha... but...
What a surprise...
But why?
And on top of that, you guys do not seem happy at all!
It is been almost a year!
But I mean, we did not think you would come back all of a sudden.
We thought it would still be a while.
What?
What?
I told you guys that I was coming back!
I wrote you guys a letter and said that even though it was sudden, I was coming back!
Here is your mail for today.
There is a letter from Hanamoto-san in Mongolia.
See?!
Sensei...
(When sending things overseas, let us make sure to give it plenty of time)
Shuu-chan?
It is really Shuu-chan!
Ha-Hagu...
Shuu-chan...
Thank you for your good work.
Ha-Hagu...
What a fine adult you have become.
Eh?
That is how you are going to react?
Have you been well?
Over there, I was always worried that you might be sick or sad.
Shuu-chan...
Hagu...
Shuu-chan!
Ha-Hagu!
She is returned to being a Korobokkur in an instant.
We have to let Mayama know.
Yeah, you are right.
And so, in celebration of the safe return of Hanamoto-sensei and Tokudaiji-sensei...
Cheers!
Thank you for the good work, Sensei.
Man, how joyous.
Thanks for the good work, Shuu-chan.
Thanks...
Thanks, everyone.
Blow your nose, you idiot.
Thank you for your good work, too, Tokudaiji-sensei.
Did the research proceed smoothly?
Mayama-kun, this gathering is a celebration, so let us leave serious talk for later.
So you did not finish.
Hanamoto, the deadline is this month.
But I am surprised that you came back earlier than expected.
I heard that it would be around March.
Tell me about it.
He would get a fever or an upset stomach, and would talk in his sleep.
Hagu...
So we ended up coming back early.
Man, I really should not have taken him with me.
Tokudaiji-sensei, you meanie!
Did not you promise not to say that?
What?
I cannot hear you.
O-Oh right.
I brought some souvenirs.
Wow, it is so cute!
Ayu, we match!
They are called dels.
Del: a traditional Mongolian costume.
And let us see, what else...
A doll, clothes for the doll, a hair ornament, and a bracelet.
All these?
Thank you so much, Sensei!
Thank you, Shuu-chan!
I accidentally bought too much.
And for the guys...
Stamp.
Postcard.
Rock.
Totally makeshift.
Man, I had to work so hard to find those.
Yeah, yeah.
It cannot be!
Hey, do not open without asking!
Is not this an outfit for Mongolian wrestling?
On top of that, the hat the proof of a champion?
How did you get this?
What is it?
Are not they cool?
Well, we really wanted them as material data, but they would not give them to us.
Yeah, it cannot be helped.
If it is called the proof of a champion, it would be stupid if you could just buy it with money.
Actually, we did not have money, either.
Then how did you...?
Well, fortunately, there was a tournament, so...
So... Tokudaiji-sensei obtained it the formal way.
So he participated... and wrested it away.
Wow, that is pretty!
What is it, Sensei?
Oh, that is a morin khuur.
Morin khuur?
That is right.
Give it to me for a second.
Oh, Hagu!
I see you smiling between Heaven and Earth!
Sensei!
Sensei!
Let me play it, too!
Sure.
Do not break it, though.
Awesome!
Awesome!
How...?
Why can you play it?
Do not we all learn it in middle school?
We do not.
But you sure took a lot of pictures.
Sensei, why are there so many pictures of these kids?
Oh, they are the kids of the family that took care of us over there.
In Mongolia, the older sibling takes really good care of their younger siblings.
The little sister really likes her older brother and always sticks close to him, saying, Big Brother!
Big Brother!
She sure was cute.
And were not you the one who always stuck close to that girl?
Saying, She looks like Hagu!
She looks like Hagu!
S-Sensei...
In the end, he broke down crying.
Sensei!
Every time he drank kumiss, he would get drunk and scream, Hagu!
Talk about embarrassing...
Kumiss: fermented mare's milk.
Sensei!
Please stop already!
Oh yeah, Morita...
How is your graduate thesis coming?
You still have not finished it?
Professor Tange is old, you know.
Do not make him worry too much.
Understand?
Finishing your work as early as possible is key.
It is unacceptable for you to be counting how many days you have until the deadline and thinking that you are still okay.
What is it, Sensei?
Those were my exact words when you were working on your graduate thesis.
Man, I sure have grown old.
To think that the day would come when I got to see you lecturing your own student...
And you have not finished your work on time.
You sure have not changed since your student days.
Morita!
Do not play such a reminiscent song!
Is not it funny?
To think that Hanamoto-sensei would seem childish around Tokudaiji-sensei...
I bet they have always been like that.
After all, Sensei will be Sensei for the rest of his life.
Is not it amazing?
Sensei was also a student here in the past.
That is right.
Sensei was just like us.
Why had not I thought of that before?
In about ten years, we will be as old as Sensei is now.
What kind of adults will we be when we are in our thirties?
Even though it might still seem far from now, today is connected to tomorrow, and tomorrow to that day in the future.
We will all become adults someday...
Such a day will come for all of us.
Mayama, can you...
P-Please stop.
It is freaky.
Me too, M-Mayama-senpai.
You too, Takemoto?
What is wrong?
I mean...
Aw, geez!
Get a hold of yourselves!
All right, we are all running back to the apartment!
The one who comes in last will have to use the open-air bath!
Hey, Mayama-san!
It is a penalty game!
Actually, that bath itself is!
Man, an open-air bath sure is nice.
So... this bath was a form of harassment, after all, was not it?
No, it is a design piece.
Be more honest.
Design...
Shuu-chan?
What is it, Hagu?
I-I am out of materials for my work.
C-Can you come with me to buy them?
What do you need?
Plaster, an acrylic board, some stained glass, a head for the burner, and a polystyrene ball.
C-Can we go, like, a day after tomorrow?
We should be done by then.
I wonder if we will really be finished by then...
I will go with you.
To the art supply store, right?
Come on, hurry and get ready.
O-Okay.
H-Hagu...
W-When did you become such good friends?
H-Hey, Takemoto...
Is H-Hagu f-f-friends with Morita now?
Yeah, she is.
Although I do not know how Hagu-chan feels.
Please do not ask me, Sensei.
Are you abandoning them all just because you do not want to fight?
Did you buy what you wanted?
Did Morita leave already?
W-Was it fun?
I-It was not.
It was not fun at all.
It was hard to keep up with him...
And when I wanted to go to the restroom, I could not tell him for the longest time.
Hagu...
I could not even remember what I needed.
I could not say it at all.
I mean, the whole time, I wanted to come back as soon as possible!
I do not like that!
I would much rather be with you, Shuu-chan!
I would like it much better!
Listen, I am going to be with my big brother forever!
Because I love him!
Everyone smiles at the young girl's innocent words...
Even though everyone knows that it is a wish that will disappear like snow with the passing of time.
But because of that, they say nothing.
I do not like that.
Yeah.
I do not want to go with anyone but Shuu-chan.
Yeah.
Let us go together once my work is done.
I am going with Shuu-chan.
Yeah, let us go.
Hagu, here.
Have some cocoa.
It will warm you up.
Yo.
Why do you look so spaced out?
I just caught the scent of snow.
Although there is no way to stop what flows downstream...
Just for a little while longer.
Let us pass through the town with its snowy scent on the way home and eat something warm.
And then... curl up and fall asleep.
akanai mabuta kosutte mieru
I rub my heavy eyelids to reveal
pastel moyou no mirai ni
A future in the shape of pastels
chiribamerareta kigou o tadoru
I follow the scattered symbols
taguri yoseta hyoujou
As my expressions were pulled in closer
nee nandakke sagashiteita mono
Say, what was it that we were looking for again?
are wa soune itsudakke
That is right, exactly when were those days
bokura ga inryoku ni sakarai nagara deatta koro
When we used to meet, denying the attraction that was forming between us?
sore ga waltz no you dane fushigi sa
It is like a waltz, is not it?
It is quite marveling
sasayaku youna komorebi no kousaten de
We paint away sceneries
futari waltz no youni ne mawari nagara
As we waltz and spin
egaki dashite yuku mono
Where the whispering sunlight falls through the trees and meet.
Next episode: A sudden kiss and an unexpected parting.
